languages.text: Пластина крепко прибита к полу, сдвинуть её явно не получится.

traits.locale_text: Пластина крепко прибита к полу, сдвинуть её явно не получится.

languages.text: Эта железяка не вызывает сомнений в своей надежности, но она прискорбно коротка для моста.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
languages.original_text: Эта железяка не вызывает сомнений в своей надежности, но она прискорбно коротка для моста.

traits.locale_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.
There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

languages.text: この鉄板が十分に頑丈なのは間違いない。だが、橋として使うにはあまりにも短すぎる。
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: この鉄板が十分に頑丈なのは間違いない。だが、橋として使うにはあまりにも短すぎる。

languages.text: Bu demir parçasının sağlam olduğu su götürmez olsa da köprü için çok kısa.
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: Bu demir parçasının sağlam olduğu su götürmez ama köprü için çok kısa.

languages.text: Este trozo de hierro es bien firme, pero demasiado corto para servir de puente.
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: Este trozo de hierro es bien firme, pero demasiado corto para servir de puente.

languages.text: 毫无疑问，这块铁条足够坚固，但它太短了，没办法当做桥来用。
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: 毫无疑问，这块铁条足够坚固，但它太短了，没办法当做桥来用。

languages.text: Si ce morceau d'acier est assez solide pour traverser, il est bien trop court pour vous servir de passerelle.
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: Si ce morceau d'acier est assez solide pour traverser, il est bien trop court pour vous servir de passerelle.

languages.text: Dieses Stück Eisen ist zweifellos robust genug, für eine Brücke aber viel zu kurz.
languages.original_text: There is no doubt that this piece of iron is sturdy enough, but it is woefully short for a bridge.

traits.locale_text: Dieses Stück Eisen ist zweifellos robust genug, für eine Brücke aber viel zu kurz.
